trans-unit.source: Discovers attributed parts in the dynamic link library (DLL) and EXE files in an application's directory and path.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ApplicationCatalog"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ApplicationCatalog"></xref> class by using the specified source for parts.
The element used by diagnostics to identify the source for parts.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ApplicationCatalog"></xref> class by using the specified reflection context.
The reflection context.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ApplicationCatalog"></xref> class by using the specified reflection context and source for parts.
The reflection context.
The element used by diagnostics to identify the source for parts.
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.DirectoryCatalog"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
Returns an enumerator that iterates through the collection.
An enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection.
Gets the export definitions that match the constraint expressed by the specified import definition.
The conditions of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition"></xref> objects to be returned.

A collection of objects that contain the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition"></xref> objects and their associated <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition"></xref> objects that match the specified constraint.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.DirectoryCatalog"></xref> object has been disposed of.
definition is .
Gets the display name of the application catalog.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

It can be used only when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ApplicationCatalog> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ICompositionElement> interface.
A string that contains a human-readable display name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.DirectoryCatalog"></xref> object.
Gets the composition element from which the application catalog originated.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

It can be used only when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ApplicationCatalog> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ICompositionElement> interface.
Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
Retrieves a string representation of the application catalog.
A string representation of the catalog.
